body_html:
Yes, this is intentional. See the docs for more details on how you can control this behavior:
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/constant_op/random_tensors

In the future, please use StackOverflow for usage questions like this.

body:
Yes, this is intentional. See the docs for more details on how you can control this behavior:
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/constant_op/random_tensors

In the future, please use StackOverflow for usage questions like this.
